Christmas Update 2.6: Christmas Cap: Log in to receive Christmas Cap 1 Dec 21 Jan 5 only and write to the future you next Christmas Time Flow: Show journals in flow view with current week steak. Time Grid: Show journals in month grids with year overviews.

Summer Update 2.5: Day Grid: Display journals in grids. Fill your lovely life with colorful daily caps. Time Fortune: Collect fortunes by writing daily caps. Share in your mood color. Piece Reward: You can obtain additional pieces with Piece Reward Program. Piece Usage: You can use pieces to craft fill edit or delete caps. Writing Polish: Optimize input response speed. Add recovery drafts. Add confirmation before sending future caps. Design Polish: Design seamless view cards. Optimize info display. Optimize layouts for new devices. Adapt date picker style for iOS 14.

Users liking Time Caps will gain a Future Cap No.1 after the update of version 1.1. _ Cap Workshop After this update Caps can be crafted by Pieces in Workshop. You could regain some Pieces by posting Daily Caps and Future Caps. Pieces are also purchasable in Workshop. In this update we make Caps craftable by Pieces in Workshop and cancel iAP of Caps while Pieces can be gained by iAP. Therefore the cost of Caps have been changed a little. After the update we present you a certain amount of Pieces as thanks and compensation for cost changes. iCloud Backup You could enable iCloud to back up and sync data now. Future Caps Future Caps arrived will remain ready for opening in app if you miss opening them through notifications A certain amount of Pieces can be regained after posting Future Caps. Daily Caps Daily Caps are editable now. A certain amount of Pieces can be regained after posting Daily Caps. The content added before will be retained after re picking Caps. Other Words You could send feedbacks to hi.pol.chen gmail.com. _ If you like Time Caps please rate it on App Store. _ Bugs Fixed Fix Daily Cap counting shown in Workshop.
